document.heading: Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority Compact Amendment Act of 1984

history.narrative: Law 5-122, the “Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority Compact Amendment Act of 1984,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-360, which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Environmental Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 26, 1984 and July 10, 1984, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 13, 1984, it was assigned Act No. 5-174 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
